title: Kapowsin Meats Recalls Pork Product Due To Possible Salmonella Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Aug. 13, 2015 Kapowsin Meats, a Graham, Wash. establishment, is recalling approximately 116,262 pounds of whole hogs that may be contaminated with Salmonella I 4, [5],12:i:-, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today.The whole hogs for barbeque item...
